headline: Section Chief  at U.S. Immigration & Customs Enforcement, Homeland Security Investigations
summary: Experienced Supervisory Special Agent with a demonstrated history of working in the law enforcement industry. Skilled in Law Enforcement, Criminal Investigations, Intelligence Analysis, Government, and National Security.

defaultPosition.description: I supervise approximately 20 employees assigned to the Counter-Proliferation Investigations Unit who are engaged in the strategic planning, direction and execution of several national and international investigative programs and liaison activities with the Departments of Defense, State, Commerce, Energy, National Security Council, Central Intelligence Agency and others. I direct, assess and implement new programs, trainings and policies to ensure the short and long term strategic objectives for the unit or accomplished on time and on budget.
defaultPosition.title: Supervisory Special Agent / Section Chief

positions.description: I supervise approximately 20 employees assigned to the Counter-Proliferation Investigations Unit who are engaged in the strategic planning, direction and execution of several national and international investigative programs and liaison activities with the Departments of Defense, State, Commerce, Energy, National Security Council, Central Intelligence Agency and others. I direct, assess and implement new programs, trainings and policies to ensure the short and long term strategic objectives for the unit or accomplished on time and on budget.
positions.title: Supervisory Special Agent / Section Chief

positions.description: I serve as a subject matter expert (SME) in the Counter-Proliferation Investigations (CPI) Program Area and on U.S export control matters.  I advise HSI leadership, HSI field personnel, and DHS senior leadership on enforcement programs, policies, regulations and legislation that impacts HSIâs CPI mission.  I am responsible for the strategic planning, direction and execution of several nationwide programs such as export control reform, industry outreach, training, firearms smuggling and dual-use & munitions related technology transfer.  As an SME I provide CPI and export control related presentations and briefings to government / industry conferences and training events.
positions.location: National Investigations Sec. Div./Counter-Proliferation Inv. Unit, Washington DC
positions.title: Special Agent / National Program Manager

positions.description: As a Homeland Security Investigations (HSI) Criminal Investigator, I am authorized to enforce immigration and customs laws.  I conduct criminal, civil, and administrative investigations that are complex, comprehensive, and require an expert level of planning and coordination.  I investigate individuals, businesses, employers, criminal organizations and terrorists or terrorist organizations that represent a significant threat to public safety and national security.  My investigations involve financial crimes, contraband smuggling and the illegal procurement of export controlled technologies / munitions.
positions.location: Special Agent in Charge, Washington DC
positions.title: Special Agent / Criminal Investigator

positions.companyName: Bureau of Industry and Security, U.S. Department of Commerce
positions.description: As an Office of Export Enforcement (OEE) Criminal Investigator, I was authorized to carry out the export enforcement responsibilities mandated by the Export Administration Act (EAA) and its implementing regulations. I developed and executed enforcement policy and collected, analyzed and evaluated intelligence information relating to actual and potential illegal diversions of U.S. origin commodities and technology controlled under the EAA. I identified and investigated allegations of violations of national security and foreign policy and coordinated intelligence and enforcement activities with other agencies of the U.S. government, as well as foreign governments.
positions.location: Office of Export Enforcement, Washington DC
positions.title: Special Agent / Criminal Investigator

positions.description: As a Customs Criminal Investigator, I planned and conducted criminal and non-criminal investigations involving highly sensitive alleged or suspected violations against Customs related laws and regulations.  Investigations were often international in scope and highly controversial with important social and political implications.
positions.location: Special Agent in Charge Caribbean, San Juan, Puerto Rico
positions.title: Special Agent / Criminal Investigator
